name: wip-backup-manager
description: This utility enables backup & restore of Kentico Kontent projects
author: richard sustek

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run ts-lint:check && npm run build:all
scripts.test:backup:cli: npm run build:commonjs && cd output && node ../_commonjs/cli/app --action=backup --projectId=b259760f-81c5-013a-05e7-69efb4b954e5 --apiKey=ew0KICAiYWxnIjogIkhTMjU2IiwNCiAgInR5cCI6ICJKV1QiDQp9..zBj0DHYKLUGiDJQ5_f3eUx02oTEzQ47X6N413ciSQQw
scripts.test:backup: npm run build:commonjs && cd output && node ../_commonjs/cli/app --config=backup-config.json
scripts.test:clean: npm run build:commonjs && cd output && node ../_commonjs/cli/app --config=clean-config.json
scripts.test:restore: npm run build:commonjs && cd output && node ../_commonjs/cli/app --config=restore-config.json
